text: Singapore Medical Group on Tuesday posted a net profit of S$2.94 million for the fourth quarter ended Dec 31 , up 17.2 per cent from a year ago .
BreadTalk Group on Tuesday posted a net profit of S$8.88 million for the fourth quarter ended Dec 31 , up 82.5 per cent from a restated net profit of S$4.87 million a year ago .
BBR stock closed at 17.4 Singapore cents on Tuesday before the profit warning was issued , down by 0.6 per cent or 0.1 Singapore cent .
